# Intro

I'm a big fan of [Shiny](https://shiny.rstudio.com/) and have used it to make some Web Apps.

# The Logistic Map

I made an app to enable users to gain a more intuitive understanding of the logistic map function. 

* You can find the Shiny app [here](https://mitchelfruin.shinyapps.io/log_map/).
* You can find the accompanying blog post [here](https://mitchthinks.netlify.app/posts/chaos_logistic_map/).
* You can find the GitHub repo [here](https://github.com/mitchelfruin/log_map_app).
